channel.title: Black Knights Fortress quest
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------Quest ID: (1) Black knights fortress------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Start: Sir Amik Varze
Npcs IDs: ID: 110 Sir Amik Varze - coords: ID: 108 Black knight - coords: 279, 1379 ID: 107 Witch - coords: 279, 1379 ID: 109 Greldo - coords: 279, 1379 ID: 100 Guard - coords: 273, 439 ID: 66 Black knight- coords
Items IDS: ID: 228 cabbage ID: 7 Iron Chain Mail Body ID: 104 medium bronze helmet
Object IDS: ID: 22 Push odd looking wall - coords: 281, 2325 ID: 22 Push odd looking wall - coords: 273, 435 ID: 154 hole - coords: 278, 2323 ID: 38 door - coords: 271, 441 ID: 2 door - coords: 278, 443 ID: 2 door - coords: 275, 439
Missing Objects: ID: 148 Listen Grill - coords: 275, 1377 ID: 147 Cauldron coords: 278, 1379 ID: 30 door coords: 279, 1383
Reward:
Missing Information: 1)Missing 1 option: Talking to Sir Amik Varze after you find out the secret weapon(Stage 2)
NPC QUEST "stages":
Sir Amik Varze: 1) Talk to Sir Amik Varze (Stage 0):------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/HjHQrQ6y 2) Retalking to Sir Amik Varze(Stage 1):--------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/aqxaCpAv 3) Talking to Sir Amik Varze after you find out the secret weapon(Stage 2) ------ http://pastebin.com/2msjcKGe 4) Talking to Sir Amik Varze after sabotaging the secret weapon(Stage 3) http://pastebin.com/Mf7g30RG 5) Talking to Sir Amik Varze after completing quest(Stage 4)------------ http://pastebin.com/LJM0bYXL
Listen Grill: 1) Listen Grill before quest(Stage 0)- "nothing interesting happens" 2) Listen Grill during quest(Stage 1)- ----------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/QyaC8FwL 3) Listen Grill after completing quest(Stage 2)- nothing interesting happens
odd looking walls: (both of them): 1) Pushing walls before, during and after quest --------------------- http://pastebin.com/411mPXjX
Black Knight: 1) Black Knight- see listen grill (stage 1), all npcs talk together in this stage
Witch: 1) Witch- see listen grill (stage 1), all npcs talk together in this stage
Greldo: 1) Greldo- see listen grill (stage 1), all npcs talk together in this stage
ID: 38 door - coords: 271, 441 1) If u go inside black knights fortress "without" iron chain and bronze med(Stage 0)- http://pastebin.com/MZEfsJbR
ID: 2 door - coords: 275, 439 1) Trying to enter the door to the black knights dining hall from the guards outside the door(Stage 0)- http://pastebin.com/QWBSv0KY
ID: 2 door - coords: 278, 443 1) If u try and enter the door to the upstairs of black knights fortress(Stage 0)- http://pastebin.com/GbL4UvAs
hole: 1) Using cabbage on hole before quest(Stage 0)- nothing happens 2) Using cabbage on hole during quest(Stage 1)----------------------- http://pastebin.com/r2WXawDH 3) Using cabbage on hole after quest is complete(Stage 2)- nothing happens
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
